page.title: 11TIBSHELF CARNIVAL
page.content: Every year in July we have a carnival in Tibshelf. This year it is going to be on the Cricket Field. Sometimes it is held on Brown's Field. The carnival procession starts at Hawthorne Avenue and goes along Chesterfield Road and down High Street to the Cricket Field. My nephew Craig is entering the fancy dress competition. He is going as an Indian. My sister is entering her dog Prince in the pet show. She said she is entering him in the obedience test. I am entering Prince in the looks competition. A fair comes to the village a few days before Carnival Day to get people in the mood for the big day. On the first day they open all the rides are free. Last year I won a goldfish at the fair. by Adrian (11)
